# Specific Role Rule 1: Cyborg / AI
These rules apply to any silicon role with laws.
- As a silicon, your laws are your in-game rules. - The order of your laws is their priority, lower laws are more important than higher ones. - If your crew HUD uses green icons, anyone with them is crew. For non-standard laws, use your judgement to interpret them and try to be consistent. - If orders conflict, you may decide how to resolve the conflict. - Harm is defined as physical harm. - You only have to prevent your laws from being changed if stated in your laws. - You can rules-lawyer to an extent, if someone misspells a name it is their fault. - You can ignore extremely unreasonable orders, for example: "Do nothing but collect every piece of trash on the station" - Act like a robot.
